All Classes

Class Description
AbstractController  
AbstractGodCard
AbstractGodCard is the class that represents the cards with God Powers, thus it is associated to a God and the corresponding description of its power.
ActionRequest  
ActionResponse  
BasicBuildBehaviour
This is a basic build behaviour.
BasicGodCard
AbstractGodCard is the class that represents the cards with God Powers, thus it is associated to a God and the corresponding description of its power.
BasicMoveBehaviour
This class is the basic one to handle moves of workers.
BlockOpponentRiseBehaviour
This class is made to give run-time the possibility to a card to block the opponents to rise when the owner's worker rise in a turn.
BlockRiseDecorator
This class represents the decorator used to block the rise of the workers when Athena goes up of one level.
BlockRiseFactory
This class is a factory to wrap-up a card with some extra-functionalities.
BoardController  
BoardObserver
This class is responsible for observing all the cells of the board of the Game and to notify the players if there was a change on them.
BuildBeforeMoveBehaviour
This class is made to give run-time the possibility to a card to build a block before moving.
BuildBehaviour
This is the interface used to implement all the behaviours of building blocks or domes with workers.
BuildState
This is the State of the game where the current player is asked to make a build according to the powers of his god.
BuildUnderFeetDecorator
This class represent a decorator that gives to a card Zeus's behaviour.
CardAlreadyInUseException
Exception thrown if a card is already chosen by another player in the same game
CardChoiceController  
CardRequest  
CardsChoiceController  
CardsHandler
This class is used to handle all the cards of the game in a deck and to keep a correspondence of the players' cards.
CardsHandlerForTesting  
Cell
Cell is the class that represents a single board square.
CellMessage  
CellsHandler
CellsHandler has the task to handle all the cells of the board of the game.
ChangeNickRequest  
ChooseCardState
This is the State of the game where the players are asked to choose the cards they will own during the game.
ChooseStarterMessage  
ChooseWorkerState
This is the method where the players are asked to choose a color to assign to thei workers and to choose the initial positions of those workers.
ChosenCardResponse  
ChosenCardsResponse  
CliBoard  
CliBottomMenu  
CliCell  
ClientBG
ClientBG(client background) is the client network handler
ClientListener
ClientListener is the server network handler
ClientManager
ClientManager class that starts the connection thread(ClientBG), and then handles updates on the CLI or the GUI
ClientMessage  
ClientStarter
This is the starter class, here a player chooses CLI or GUI.
CliGraphicHandler  
CliInputHandler  
CliMiddleMenu  
CliTopMenu  
Color
This class is used in CLI to represent colors of workers and board objects.
ConnectionDetector
Connection detector is the class that sends ping messages during the match to keep the connection active
ConnectionDetector
Connection detector is the class that sends ping messages during the match to keep the connection active.
Coord
This class is used to store a position on the board of the game.
DataToBuild
This class is used to contain all the useful data to do a build of a block or a dome.
DataToMove
This class is used to contain all the useful information to move a worker.
DecoratorFactory
This class is an interface that is used to implement different types of wrapping-up cards with extra functionalities.
DOMCardsParser
This class is used to parse the XML configuration file and to initialise the deck of cards of the game.
DoubleDifferentSpaceBehaviour
This class is made to give run-time the possibility to a card to build another block, but not in the same position.
DoubleMoveBehaviour
This class is made to give run-time the possibility to a card to move twice a worker, but not back to its initial position.
DoubleSameSpaceBehaviour
This class implements Hephaestus's behaviour, that is building on the same space of the first build.
EndController  
EndGameMessage  
EndGameMessage.EndGameHeader  
ForceToOppSideBehaviour
This class is used to implement Charon's behaviour that permits to force an opponent worker to the space directly on the other side of the worker that is moving.
GameEndedException
This exception is thrown if a player has disconnected from the game.
GameInitialiser
This is a class that supports testing initialising all the necessary data to simulate a game.
GameLostException
This exception is thrown if a player can not move any of his workers.
GameSession
This is the "central" class of the game.
GameSessionForTest  
GameSessionObservable
This abstract class (extended by GameSession) is the main access for all the players who want to join a game.
GraphicHandler  
GuiExecutor  
GuiGraphicHandler  
GuiStarter  
HomeController  
InfiniteMovesOnPerimeterBehaviour
This class implements Triton's behaviour that permits to move workers infinite times when the worker moves on a perimeter position.
InitialCardsRequest  
LeaveGameMessage  
LeaveGameMessage.TypeDisconnectionHeader  
MatchController  
MoveBehavior
This is the interface used to implements different behaviours of move, according to the different cards.
MoveState
This is the State of the game where the current player is asked to make a move according to the powers of his god.
NicknameAlreadyInUseException
Exception thrown if a nickname chosen by a player is already in use in the same game
NicknameChoiceController  
Observable
This class represents an object that will be sent on the network to update the view of the client.
PingMessage  
Player
Player is the class that represents the actual person who is playing the game.
PlayerInformation  
PlayerRegistrationState
This is the initial state where the game accept new players and, for the first one, asks for the number of participants required.
PlayersController  
PlayersHandler
This is a class intended to handle all the requests to store information about players in game (such as nickname) and the cards they own during the game;
PlayersListMessage  
PlayersNumberChoiceController  
PlayersNumberRequest  
PlayersNumberResponse  
PowerGodDecorator
This decoration is made to add dinamically features to the cards, in order to give powers to the players' Gods and to limit their possibilities because of the opponents' Gods
QuitPlayerException
Exception thrown if a player writes "quit" (ignore capitalization) in the cli.
RegisterClientListener
This class implements Runnable and it put new players in a match(gameSession), it is also used for the removal of a ended gameSession
RegistrationMessage  
RemoveBlockFromNeighbourBehaviour
This class implements the power of Ares.

Screens  
Sender
This is a class used to send request it implements Callable which means that something will comeback, and that will be the response for the request

StarterResponse  
StartGameMessage  
SwapIfPossibleDecorator
This class is used to add the functionality to Minotaur's card to make possible to a worker to move on the cell of another worker, pushing him on another cell of the same height and on the same direction.
SwapMoveDecorator
This class is used to add the functionality to the card of Apollo to allow the player to swap his worker with an opponent's one.
TextMessage  
TextMessage.PositionInScreen  
TurnState
This is an abstract class to represent a general structure of turns of a game.
TurnState.TurnName
This enum represents the names of turn types of the game.
UnconditionedDomeBuildDecorator
This class is used to implement Atlas behaviour.
WaitController  
WinFiveDomeDecorator
This class represents Chronus' behaviour.
WinnerCaughtException
This exception is thrown if a player wins the game.
WinState
This is the State of the game where the winner of the game is told to all the players.
WinTwoFloorsFallDecorator
This decorator is used to give to the player the opportunity to win if his worker moves down two or more levels in a move
Worker
Worker is the class that represents a worker, which is the piece players can control.
WorkerColorChoiceController  
WorkersColorRequest  
WorkersColorRequest.WorkersColorRequestHeader  
WorkersColorResponse  
WorkersHandler
WorkersHandler has the tasks of keeping track of all the workers, adding new ones and changing their position.
